meanings.definition: The state or quality of being riotous.
meanings.sent1: The riotousness of the party made it hard to hear anything.
meanings.sent2: The riotousness of the children playing in the park was a joy to watch.
meanings.sent3: The riotousness of the puppies chasing each other around the yard was both chaotic and adorable.
meanings.sent4: The riotousness of the storm outside matched the turmoil in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The riotousness of the colors in the painting created a vibrant and energetic atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Behavior characterized by wild and noisy disorder.
meanings.sent1: The students' riotousness during the assembly disrupted the entire school.
meanings.sent2: The riotousness of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement of the event.
meanings.sent3: The riotousness of the monkeys at the zoo entertained the visitors with their playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The riotousness of the market reflected the unpredictable nature of the economy.
meanings.sent5: The riotousness of the fans at the football game created a lively and spirited atmosphere.
